title: The Lion of Judah Turns Out To Be a Lamb
itunes:title: The Lion of Judah Turns Out To Be a Lamb
description: "As John looks into the throne room of heaven, he sees a King holding a scroll, which stands for the meaning of history. The only one in heaven or on earth who is able to open it is the ""lamb standing as though slain,"" that is to say, Jesus Christ crucified and risen from the dead. He, we Christians claim, is the secret, the key, the breaker of the code."

He, we Christians claim, is the secret, the key, the breaker of the code."

itunes:summary: "As John looks into the throne room of heaven, he sees a King holding a scroll, which stands for the meaning of history. The only one in heaven or on earth who is able to open it is the ""lamb standing as though slain,"" that is to say, Jesus Christ crucified and risen from the dead. He, we Christians claim, is the secret, the key, the breaker of the code."
itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
